message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.DS. 

The paper deals with network communication and optimization, which are common topics in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The use of network coding also suggests a possible fit in the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. Finally, the algorithmic approach and analysis of the capacity region suggest a possible fit in the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category.
